sourcesContent:
<template>
    <canvas ref="chart"></canvas>
</template>
  
<script>
import { Chart } from 'chart.js/auto';

export default {
    name: 'HotelChart',
    props: {
        chartData: {
            type: Object,
            default: null,
        },
    },
    mounted() {
        console.log('something')
    },
    updated() {
        console.log(this.chartData);
        const ctx = this.$refs.chart.getContext('2d');
        new Chart(ctx, {
            type: 'line',
            data: this.chartData,
        });
    },
}
</script>
